item.title: Docker AWS
item.description: If you would like to follow along: This tutorial assumes the user has already downloaded and installed the following: Docker Mac OSX: https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/ Windows: https://docs.docker.com/engine/installation/windows/ AWS Command Line Interface (CLI) https://aws.amazon.com/cli/ Why docker is useful? No worries about missing dependencies, packages, and other pain points during subsequent deployments Reduce/eliminate concerns about compatibility on different platforms. This has the potential to eliminate much of our Windows/Mac issues.
